assignments.description: Assign and set values. Default all checks to True
assignments.name: assAssign_Values
assignments.label: Assign Values

assignments.description: Since PDC is reused clear trailer regos, however for DT and RV dont clear if check not done
assignments.name: assClear_Regos
assignments.label: Clear Regos

assignments.description: Dummy assignment to improve path of arrows
assignments.name: assDummy_Assignment
assignments.label: Dummy Assignment

assignments.description: If driver declares unsafe, then critical fail true
assignments.name: assSet_Critical_Fail5
assignments.label: Set Critical Fail

assignments.description: Set Repair No Keep In Progress - so can be reused for next PDC check Return Failed check status to calling flow
assignments.name: assSet_Status_Fault_No_C
assignments.label: Set Status and Fault C

assignments.description: Set Repair No Set Status to Completed Return Passed with Issue check status to calling flow
assignments.name: assSet_Status_Fault_No_NC
assignments.label: Set Status Fault No NC

assignments.description: Set Status completed and Fault Number to null
assignments.name: assSet_Status_Passed
assignments.label: Set Status Passed

assignments.description: Record Rego just entered so it can be compared with the next value entered
assignments.name: Store_Rego_Entered_A
assignments.label: Store Rego Entered

decisions.description: If no value set for barcode in scrn then set to "-", else any previous val will not be updated
decisions.name: decATBCFrontNull
decisions.label: Barcode Front Null?

decisions.description: If no value set for barcode in scrn then set to "-", else any previous val will not be updated
decisions.name: decATBCRearNull
decisions.label: Barcode Rear Null?

decisions.description: If no value set for barcode in scrn then set to "-", else any previous val will not be updated
decisions.name: decBTBCFrontNull
decisions.label: Barcode Front Null?

decisions.description: If no critical issue recorded, still allow driver to declare vehicle unsafe.
decisions.name: decCritical_Fail
decisions.label: Critical Fail?

decisions.description: If called from Pre Departure Check then end as critical failure detected, else continue with trailer check
decisions.name: decPDC1
decisions.label: PDC?

decisions.description: If called from Pre Departure Check then end as critical failure detected, else continue with trailer check
decisions.name: decPDC2
decisions.label: PDC?

decisions.description: If called from Pre Departure Check then end as critical failure detected, else continue with trailer check
decisions.name: decPDC3
decisions.label: PDC?

decisions.description: If no value set for barcode in scrn then set to "-", else any previous val will not be updated
decisions.name: decPMBCFrontNull
decisions.label: Barcode Front Null?

decisions.description: If no value set for barcode in scrn then set to "-", else any previous val will not be updated
decisions.name: decRBCFrontNull
decisions.label: Barcode Front Null

decisions.description: If no value set for barcode in scrn then set to "-", else any previous val will not be updated
decisions.name: decRBCRearNull
decisions.label: Barcode Rear Null

decisions.description: If PDC Trailer or Drop off Trailer then trailer check, else truck
decisions.name: decVehicle_Or_Trailer
decisions.label: Vehicle Or Trailer?

decisions.description: If the Driver has entered the same registration number as last attempt, then accept the entry and proceed. This scenario caters for both the device being offline, or the Trailer not exisiting in the system (which may happen for trailers).
decisions.name: Rego_Entered_Twice_ATrailer
decisions.label: Rego Entered Twice?

decisions.description: If the Driver has entered the same registration number as last attempt, then accept the entry and proceed. This scenario caters for both the device being offline, or the Trailer not exisiting in the system (which may happen for trailers).
decisions.name: Rego_Entered_Twice_BTrailer
decisions.label: Rego Entered Twice

Flow.description: Flow to process Transport vehicle check for vehicles. With VII datetime constraint. With RT Fault No fix. Removed CI Alert and Info. With cancel flow on critcal msg. With Reason no scan Truck and Trailers. New and upd checks. Default All True 2. Remove Back from Scan Truck. Move Commit End with Status set
Flow.label: TDF_Vehicle_Check

recordLookups.description: Lookup truck with Barcode = value entered, and not null, and not equal to current time (to ensure requery to get updated status when faulted)
recordLookups.name: rlLookup_Truck_on_Barcode
recordLookups.label: Lookup Truck on Barcode

recordLookups.description: Lookup truck with Rego = value entered, and not null, and not equal to current time (to ensure requery to get updated status when faulted)
recordLookups.name: rlLookup_Truck_Type
recordLookups.label: Lookup Truck Type

screens.description: Get driver to record which vehicle is unsafe, so PDC can be associated correctly.
screens.name: Declaration_Failed
screens.label: Vehicle Check Failed

fields.name: txtFailedDeclaration
fields.fieldText:
You have declared a vehicle to be unsafe.
Please indicate below which vehicle is unsafe, then report to the supervisor to log a defect and be allocated a new vehicle.

fields.name: fldATAir_lines_and_cables
fields.fieldText: Air lines and cables connected & locked

fields.name: fldATWheel_nut
fields.fieldText: Wheel nut indicators, rims & mud flaps

fields.name: fldATFree_of_oil_leaks
fields.fieldText: Free of Air or oil leaks

fields.name: fldATTurntable
fields.fieldText: Inspect Turntable to ensure correct operation, no visible damage and greased where applicable

fields.name: fldATAll_lights
fields.fieldText: All lights and beepers operate correctly

fields.name: txtAdditional_ItemsHeadAT
fields.fieldText: Enter any additional items in the field below.

fields.name: txtBNSTB
fields.fieldText: Please select the reason for not scanning the rear barcode, or select Back to re-enter.

fields.name: txtBNST
fields.fieldText: Please select the reason for not scanning the rear barcode, or select Back to re-enter.

fields.name: txtBNSTA
fields.fieldText: Please select the reason for not scanning the rear barcode, or select Back to re-enter.

fields.name: fldRClear_of_fluid_leaks
fields.fieldText: Clear of fluid leaks under truck?

fields.name: fldRCheck_fluids
fields.fieldText: Check fluids fuel, adblue, oils, coolant

fields.name: fldRVehicle_Grab_handles
fields.fieldText: Vehicle Grab handles and steps secure

fields.name: fldRLights_all_operational
fields.fieldText: Lights all operational: stop, tail, etc

fields.name: fldRMirrors_secure
fields.fieldText: Mirrors secure, clear and correctly adj

fields.name: fldRSeat_and_seat_belts
fields.fieldText: Seat and seat belts in good condition

fields.name: fldRHorn_reverse_alarm
fields.fieldText: Horn, reverse alarm and instruments working

fields.name: fldRPark_foot_brake
fields.fieldText: Park and foot brake operate correctly

fields.name: fldRBrake_air_pressure
fields.fieldText: Brake air pressure. ABS light goes out

fields.name: fldRLoad_restraint
fields.fieldText: Load restraint straps, pins, posts OK

fields.name: fldRInspect_curtain
fields.fieldText: Inspect curtain for damage and tears

fields.name: fldRCheck_curtain_support
fields.fieldText: Check curtain support & posts for damage

fields.name: fldRBody_for_cracks
fields.fieldText: Body for cracks and security of panels

fields.name: fldRMudguards
fields.fieldText: Mudguards secure and in good condition

fields.name: fldRTyre_pressure
fields.fieldText: Tyre pressure decal dated within one mth

fields.name: fldRTool_kit_present
fields.fieldText: Tool kit present and complete (if appl)

fields.name: fldRAll_Panels_and_exterior
fields.fieldText: All Panels and exterior fittings secure

fields.name: fldRInterior_clean
fields.fieldText: Interior clean and in good condition

fields.name: fldRPaint_panel
fields.fieldText: Check and report damage – paint & panel

fields.name: fldRDoor_seals
fields.fieldText: Door seals are intact and secure

fields.name: txtLSEChecks
fields.fieldText: Load Shifting Equipment Checklist Items (if carried)

fields.name: fldRLSE_Body_Forks
fields.fieldText: Body & Forks-Check for cracks or damage

fields.fieldText: Enter any additional items in the field below.

fields.fieldText:
An Non Critical Issue has been recorded.
If required, please enter the fault repair number below:

fields.name: txFixedItem
txtFRN
fields.fieldText: Please enter the fault repair number below:

fields.name: txtInFaultAT
fields.fieldText:
The vehicle {!varTrailerARego} is in Fault status and can not be used.
Please report to your supervisor to be allocated a new vehicle.

fields.name: txtFailedMsg
fields.fieldText:
Vehicle {!varFailedVehicleRego} has failed the pre-departure check and is not safe.
Please report to the supervisor to log a defect and be allocated a new vehicle (or select X to exit the flow and cancel all changes).

fields.fieldText: Clear of fluid leaks under truck?

fields.fieldText: Please scan the barcode located on front right side of the trailer.

fields.fieldText: Touch the field above to position the cursor before scanning.

fields.fieldText: Please scan the vehicle barcode located on the outside of the cabin by the driver's door.

fields.name: txtScanBCAT
fields.fieldText:
Registration Number: {!varTrailerARego}
Scan vehicle barcode at rear to confirm inspection.

fields.fieldText:
Registration Number: {!varFailedVehicleRego}
Scan vehicle barcode at rear to confirm inspection.

fields.name: txtScanBarcodesBT
fields.fieldText:
Registration Number: {!varTrailerBRego}
Scan vehicle barcode at rear to confirm inspection.

fields.name: txtTrailerBNotFound
fields.fieldText:
A trailer with the registration number entered could not be found.
Please select Next to retry.

fields.name: txtBTInFault
fields.fieldText:
The vehicle {!varTrailerBRego} is in Fault status and can not be used.
Please report to your supervisor to be allocated a new vehicle.

fields.name: txtFaultedTruck
fields.fieldText:
The vehicle {!varFailedVehicleRego} is in Fault status and can not be used.
Please report to your supervisor to be allocated a new vehicle.

fields.name: txtDecMsg
fields.fieldText: By completing this form you are making a declaration as the driver of this vehicle that on the basis of your vehicle inspection, that included a check of all the prescribed areas listed, and to the best of your knowledge as a driver/loader (not as a qualified mechanic), that the vehicle is:

fields.name: txtTrailerANotFound
fields.fieldText:
A trailer with the registration number entered could not be found.
Please select Next to retry.

fields.name: msgTruckNotFound
fields.fieldText:
A truck with details entered could not be found.
Please enter the registration number and select Next to continue.

variables.description: Context called from: PDC (prepare vehicle) RV (return vehicle DT (drop trailer)
variables.name: varMode
